name: OR_LOG_SURG_NOTES
description: Use OR_LOG_SURGN_NOTES table instead of this. The OR_LOG_SURG_NOTES table contains OR management system log surgeon notes in free-text. This table will be discontinued in future.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log the surgeon notes refers to.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the surgeon notes in the surgical log.

columns.name: SURGEON_NOTES
columns.description: The free text surgeon notes in the surgical log.
